meanings.definition: A highway or expressway in France and other French-speaking countries.
meanings.sent1: The autoroute was busy with cars rushing to their destinations.
meanings.sent2: We took the autoroute to avoid traffic on the smaller roads.
meanings.sent3: Why did the chicken cross the autoroute? To get to the other side!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like an autoroute, always moving fast and never slowing down.
meanings.sent5: The autoroute stretched out before us like a ribbon of asphalt cutting through the countryside.

meanings.sent1: We autorouted to Paris for the weekend getaway.
meanings.sent2: He autoroutes to work every day to save time.
meanings.sent3: I autorouted through the city like a pro, dodging traffic with ease.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts autorouted through her mind, jumping from one idea to the next.
meanings.sent5: Autorouting through the countryside, we enjoyed the scenic views along the way.
